import React from 'react'; import requireAuth from '../requireAuth'; import WeatherComponent from './Weather'; import "../components/dashboard.css"; // import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Button, // Container, // Divider, // Grid, // Header, // Icon, Image, // List, // Menu, // Responsive, // Segment, // Sidebar, // Visibility, Card // Search } from 'semantic-ui-react'; let sensorData = 'https://io.adafruit.com/api/feeds?x-aio-key=1de8b4e601e94f9a96f29c07626470c2'; // const initialState = { isLoading: false, results: [], value: '' } // const getWidth = () => { // const isSSR = typeof window === 'undefined' // return isSSR ? Responsive.onlyTablet.minWidth : window.innerWidth // } class Dashboard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { forecast: [], tempMain: {} } } componentDidMount() { let updateSensor = () => { fetch(sensorData) .then((response) => { console.log(response) return response.json() }) } } render() { console.log(updateSensor) return ( <>
Sage Herb Sage is a herb {this.updateSensor}
Rosemary Herb Rosemary is a herb
Thyme Herb Thyme is a herb
Sage Herb Sage is a herb
Rosemary Herb Rosemary is a herb
Thyme Herb Thyme is a herb
); } } export default Dashboard; // REQUIRE AUTH EXPORT // export default requireAuth(Dashboard)
